about_the_game:
Stick 'Em Up 2: Paper Adventures is a run'n'gun/platform game of stick figure characters fighting through beautiful paper and card levels.

With this Starter Edition you can play the first level and fly across city rooftops firing rockets from a helicopter. If your friend has the full edition of the game you can also use this version to join them over your local network and play the whole game: leaping between pirate ships with a sword, racing buggies on the moon, and more!

  • Play with between 1 and 4 players with extra controllers or by connecting over your local network
  • Play together in campaign mode, or fight against each other in VS and Team VS modes when playing over network
detailed_description:
Stick 'Em Up 2: Paper Adventures is a run'n'gun/platform game of stick figure characters fighting through beautiful paper and card levels.

With this Starter Edition you can play the first level and fly across city rooftops firing rockets from a helicopter. If your friend has the full edition of the game you can also use this version to join them over your local network and play the whole game: leaping between pirate ships with a sword, racing buggies on the moon, and more!

  • Play with between 1 and 4 players with extra controllers or by connecting over your local network
  • Play together in campaign mode, or fight against each other in VS and Team VS modes when playing over network

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or later
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports mouse and keyboard, Xbox 360 controllers, Xbox One controllers, and other Steam-configured controllers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or later
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports mouse and keyboard, Xbox 360 controllers, and Xbox One controllers

name: Stick 'Em Up 2 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports mouse and keyboard, Xbox 360 controllers, and Xbox One controllers

short_description: Stick 'Em Up 2: Paper Adventures is a run'n'gun/platform game of stick figure characters fighting through beautiful paper and card levels. Fly across city rooftops firing rockets from a helicopter, leap between pirate ships with a sword, race buggies on the moon, and more!
